1.title: Sof & Lena & Taeyong are faced with the Camping of Death!

episode of.title: DIA TV Original: Cook or The Dead (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: The camp cooking channel \"Surprise\" was fake~. Then, what is the situation waiting for Sof, Lena Taeyong?.

2.title: The Survival Cooking Is Finally Revealed!

episode of.title: DIA TV Original: Cook or The Dead (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: In order to avoid zombies, Sof, Lena and Taeyong entered a safety house. The fish hole has a strange atmosphere - What is the first mission waiting for them?.

3.title: Sof Shows his real ability! The first survival food: Rice topped with Tuna & Mayo

episode of.title: DIA TV Original: Cook or The Dead (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: The First Survival Recipe: Rice Topped With Tuna and Mayo. Sof played a brilliant role despite the limited ingredients. Let's check out Sof's recipe. Ingredients: Lettuce, Onion, Perilla Leaves, Mayonnaise, Can of Tuna, Cooked Rice, Pepper, Salt, and Wasabi. 2~3 served. Recipe -- 1) Wash the lettuce with water.

4.title: Outdoor Food Tasting, Lena's Obsessed with Wasabi!

episode of.title: DIA TV Original: Cook or The Dead (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: Here are our special tips for eating \"Rice Topped With Tuna and Mayo\" more deliciously. Check it out in this video!.

5.title: Cook Tuna Cream Risotto Away from Zombies!

episode of.title: DIA TV Original: Cook or The Dead (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: The most unexpected mission: Avoid zombies and get ingredients for food. Let's check what food has been made. Ingredients for Tuna Cream Risotto: Garlic, Carrot, Green Pumpkin, Fresh Cream, Salt, Cooked Rice, Salt, Olive Oil, and Grana Padano Cheese. Recipe -- 1) Slice well washed 3-4 garlic pieces. 2) Fry sliced garlic in a pan with olive oil. Take them out on a plate. 3) Dice the carrots small.

6.title: Taeyong's Tuna Scorched Rice Pizza vs. Lena's Stir-Fried Noodles with Hot Pepper Tuna

episode of.title: DIA TV Original: Cook or The Dead (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: Finally opened Cuckoo Crew Taeyong's Tuna Scorched Rice Pizza and beauty creator Lena's Stir-Fried Noodles With Hot Pepper Tuna.Who will be the winner?. Tuna Scorched Rice Pizza Ingredients: Paprika, Olive Oil, Red Pepper Paste, Ketchup, Canned Corn, Canned Tuna, Onion, Cooked Rice, Mayonnaise, Sugar, Pepper, Mozzarella Cheese, and Sliced Cheese. Recipe -- 1) Slice three colors of paprika's.

7.title: Sudden Reveal: What Happened at the Cook or The Dead's First Survival Area? (Feat. Stories That Weren't Told)

episode of.title: DIA TV Original: Cook or The Dead (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: Last weekend, Cook or The Dead went on a second mission. Then, without being able to prepare another episode, the youngest PD took time to make a \"Behind the Scenes\" video. See the stories that weren't seen due to editing.

8.title: DIA TV Halloween Party 2016 with Global Creators!

episode of.title: DIA TV Original: Cook or The Dead (TV Series 2016– )

8.plot: Let's take a peek at the most amazing Halloween Party that DIA TV threw with its Global Creators. Don't miss our music video too.

9.title: DIA TV Halloween Parody Music Video: Bobby_YGGR

episode of.title: DIA TV Original: Cook or The Dead (TV Series 2016– )

9.plot: Bobby_YGGR's Parody Music Video produced by DIA TV With Global Creators. Have fun watching.

10.title: Water Gun Festival with SSIN, ShinChae, Hemtube, Sunba, Kkonji

episode of.title: DIA TV Original: Cook or The Dead (TV Series 2016– )

10.plot: We went to the Water Gun Festival with SSIN, ShinChae, Hemtube, Sunba, and Kkonji. We divided into two teams, and we fought with water guns. Guess who will be the winner!.

11.title: SOF, Lena & Taeyong in the Desert!

episode of.title: DIA TV Original: Cook or The Dead (TV Series 2016– )

11.plot: Following the \"Zombie\" episodes, now the \"Desert\" episodes start. Stay tuned for SoLeYong's remarkable activities in the desert!.

imdb.title: DIA TV Original: Cook or The Dead
akas: DIA TV Original: Cook or The Dead (South Korea)
plot: Cook the best dish with only one ingredient!! This is SOF, Lena and Taeyong's real survival cooking show! Stay tuned for fun cooking challenges like you've never seen before.
